ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SDO/HMI Data Products at JSOC/Stanford U.
ResourceHeader.Description: The HMI-AIA (Helioseismic and Magnetic Imager - Atmospheric Imaging Assembly) JSOC (Joint Science Operations Center) at Stanford University archives, and provides multiple access paths to, a variety of SDO(Solar Dynamics Observatory)/HMI digital and display solar images and movies. Included are dopplergrams (maps of solar surface velocity), continuum filtergrams (broad-wavelength photographs of the solar photosphere), and both line-of-sight and vector magnetograms (maps of the photospheric magnetic field).
